CustomField.description: API name of the field that links source and destination objects. Example: Source object = cscfga__Product_Basket__c Destination object = csmso__Sales_Order__c Relationship field = csmso__Sales_Order__c (field from the cscfga__Product_Basket__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the field that links source and destination objects. Example: Source object = cscfga__Product_Basket__c Destination object = csmso__Sales_Order__c Relationship field = csmso__Sales_Order__c (field from the cscfga__Product_Basket__c)
CustomField.label: Relationship field API Name
